sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Coronavirus Urgent Remediation Emergency Borrowing Act or the CURE Borrowing Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Coronavirus Urgent Remediation Emergency Borrowing Act or the CURE Borrowing Act.

sections.heading: Findings and purpose. The General Assembly finds that:
sections.text: Findings and purpose. The General Assembly finds that:

sections.heading: Bonds, notes, certificates or other facilities; appropriation.
sections.text: Bonds, notes, certificates or other facilities; appropriation.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
